item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldpdw4vwi22n
item.description: My request for #BlueSky is to add the functionality to follow hashtags as well, just like how you can do in the #Fediverse and #Mastodon.
item.content:encoded: My request for #BlueSky is to add the functionality to follow hashtags as well, just like how you can do in the #Fediverse and #Mastodon.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldpd7gdvis2k
item.description: Inc: Is Matt Mullenweg the Mad King of WordPress? Fortunately for us Matt didn’t have dragons. Otherwise, we would have been burned to the ground. www.inc.com/∞

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldovjmejrk2n
item.description: To put it into perspective, my #PDS directory size is at 14MB, while #GoToSocial at 1.9GB.
item.content:encoded: To put it into perspective, my #PDS directory size is at 14MB, while #GoToSocial at 1.9GB.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldnhhfg4ec2n
item.description: This Viber Business Inbox is a total trash. You will need to turn off each business one by one, every time a new business pops up in your inbox. There’s no option to disable it altogether! #Viber is a total trash! Why would someone else use this app?
item.content:encoded: This Viber Business Inbox is a total trash. You will need to turn off each business one by one, every time a new business pops up in your inbox. There’s no option to disable it altogether! #Viber is a total trash! Why would someone else use this app?
